summary: NOV 19, 2018.WAS DRIVING IN TOWN AND VEHICLE DIED WHILE MOVING. TOWED TO DEALERSHIP. REPLACED PIM, OUT OF SERVICE 17 DAYS. JAN 10, 2019. VEHICLE DIED IN TOWN. WAS EVENTUALLY ABLE TO RESTART AND DROVE IT TO DEALERSHIP. CLEARED CODES AND CLEANED TERMINALS. VEHICLE OOS ONE DAY. JANUARY 27, 2019. VEHICLE DIED WHILE DRIVING IN TOWN. RESTARTED WITH DIFFICULTY, THEN DIED AGAIN. VEHICLE TOWED TO DEALERSHIP. STILL THERE AS OF FEB 17, REPLACING TRANSMISSION.YOUR PROGRAM WON'T LET ME DOWNLOAD ALL FILES. HAD U73 DONE ON 6JUL18, U94 ON 8NOV18. NO CRASH, NO FIRE, NO INJUTIES OR FATALITIES.
